definitions.explanation_en: A surname of Scottish origin, commonly found in English-speaking countries; it does not carry a general semantic meaning outside of its use as a proper name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自苏格兰的姓氏，常见于英语国家；作为专有名词使用时无普遍语义含义。
definitions.example_en: John Rankin was a prominent abolitionist and educator in the 19th century.
definitions.example_cn: 约翰·兰金是19世纪一位著名的废奴主义者和教育家。
